content: @Hans Buitendijk @David Hay @Paul Knapp your FMG memberships have expired (along with mine and Lloyd's). Are you comfortable standing for another two year term?

Sent to TSC:

Item for a TSC call: FMG membership has expired for five members; we're hoping TSC will approve reappointment, and then there's a broader conversation about whether TSC has a process in place or intentions to:

  • guide management group membership composition

  • solicit feedback or identify concerns from the community re: members or overall composition

  • establish reminders or some other system of responsibility to avoid mass expiration events in the future

...or whether these responsibilities lie with the individual management groups.
OK, we're all five of us re-instated.

Suggestions from TSC discussion:

  • Management groups should set their own composition targets
  • Management groups should keep track of their own expirations, but TSC recognizes that a better system of proactive notifications is worth developing
  • Management groups should try to ensure that cochair term expirations are staggered

• TSC will in future consider ("parking lot item") whether/how to evaluate management group health (analagous to workgroup health). For the time being, this is a management group responsibility, where each group can discuss/propose ideas.
